Hao Xu (徐 昊)

Biography

I received my Master’s degree at School of Information and Communication Engineering from the University of Electronic Science and Technology of China (UESTC) , supervised by Prof. Guanghui LIU and Prof. Shuaicheng LIU. Before that, I got my Bachelor’s degree from the Sichuan University (SCU). My research interests include 3D registration and 3D point cloud representation.

Projects

Driver Monitor System

Dec. 2018 - July 2019

Design a light-weighted end-to-end network running on an onboard chip to detect smoking, phoning, and drinking in driving.

NIO Gaze Estimation

July 2019 - Mar. 2020

Design a light-weighted end-to-end network running on an onboard chip to estimate gaze and detect eye closure and occlusion at the same time.
